extension.summary: kentestvn
extension.description: kentestvn
Permite guardar de forma automatica api keys OMDb, MDBList, SubDL y RPDB en los add-ons o skins compatibles.

extension.summary: Llista i reprodueix enllaços fent servir el complement Horus.
List and play links via the Horus addon.
Lista y reproduce enlaces a través del addon Horus.
extension.description: BlackCat utilitza Horus com a passarel·la per reproduir enllaços i també és necessari tindre instal·lat AceStream.
BlackCat uses Horus to play AceStream links and you also need to have AceStream installed.
BlackCat usa Horus para reproducir enlaces y también es necesario tener instalado AceStream.
extension.disclaimer: [COLOR red]BlackCat només recopila enllaços publicats a pàgines web disponibles al públic general.[/COLOR]
[COLOR red]BlackCat only collects links posted on websites that are available to the general public.[/COLOR]
[COLOR red]BlackCat solo recopila enlaces publicados en páginas web disponibles para el público en general.[/COLOR]
extension.news: ~[1.3.2] Minor bug fix and add events. ~[1.3.2] Minor bug fix and add directs. ~[1.3.1] Change ls+. ~[1.3.0] Add ls+ and 3cp support. ~[1.2.9] HDN minor fix. ~[1.2.7] Bug fix SUP. ~[1.0.9] First release.

extension.summary: GreekTV and VOD addon By don24crk
extension.description: GreekTV By don24crk is an addon allowing streaming content available mostly in Greek language.
extension.disclaimer: GreekTV By don24crk's author does not host, stream or distribute any of the content displayed inside this software and cannot be held responsible for the quality or availability of the listed streams. On demand content is scraped from various websites and is freely available on the internet on public domains. This software acts only as a search engine. Kindly note that GreekTV By don24crk is not an official part of the media player you are running, and therefore not to be mentioned within official support channels, this addon has nothing to do with the media player itself, nor it’s intended use, it is simply a third party plugin which has been added to your system and it is provided "as is" with no warranty.

extension.summary: Site-uri cu filme subtitrate in limba romana
extension.description: Colectie de site-uri cu filme si seriale traduse in limba romana

item.visible: !String.StartsWith(ListItem.FileNameAndPath, plugin://plugin.video.s4me/) + [ String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype, tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype, movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype, season) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype, episode) ]

extension.summary: Downloads torrents and share it over HTTP
Загружает торренты и раздает их по HTTP
extension.description: Обеспечивает последовательную (sequential) загрузку торрентов для потокового онлайн просмотра через HTTP. Основан на библиотеке LibTorrent.
Provides sequential torrent downloading for online streaming video and other media over HTTP.

extension.summary: Tulip library with helper functions for Kodi and its forks
extension.description: Tulip library combines the best elements from Lambda's "lamlib" and tknorris's shared modules. Also includes various enhancements, newer and improved functions and Python 3 compatibility, though the latter is largely untested. Can also be as standalone utils
extension.news:
[B]3.1.X[/B] - Update user agent strings - Added a few more utilities - Add offscreen boolean parameter for ListItem - Bug fixes
[B]3.0.X[/B] - Utilize certifi for net module - Add ability to save locally unencrypted m3u8 ts video content - Update user agent strings - Change the way kodi version is obtained - Add limit and username/password auth to net module - Convert url bytes object to string (python 3 only)
